thread.title: This Daring Doggo Crashed A Cross-Country Ski Race And Looked Very Excited And Happy The Whole Time - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: This Daring Doggo Crashed A Cross-Country Ski Race And Looked Very Excited And Happy The Whole Time - BuzzFeed News

author: Remy Smidt
title: This Daring Doggo Crashed A Cross-Country Ski Race And Looked Very Excited And Happy The Whole Time - BuzzFeed News
text:
“It happens in cycling races, but I’ve never seen it in skiing,” Alex Harvey, who came in second, told The Canadian Press. “It just makes the story even better because luckily no one crashed or got hurt.” ID: 10742088 7. People were pretty obsessed with the intrusion. “Dogs just wanna have fun!” said this person. @NBCOlympics That's hysterical! Dogs just wanna have fun!
— Catherine Burnett (@TriCatherine) ID: 10741723 8. “Funniest thing I’ve ever seen in winter sports.” @NBCOlympics funniest thing I've ever seen in winter sports
— Casey Moore (@caseymoore977) ID: 10742778 9. Another good, good boy’s adventure… @NBCOlympics @blackrosetea IN THE CONTINUING ADVENTURES OF GOOD, GOOD BOYS
— Curious George (@EnsGDT) ID: 10741691 10. Who are you, mysterious pup? Nasz Maniuś to jednak grzeczny psiak. Nigdy sobie na taką samowolkę nie pozwolił, choć podpuszczany był niejednokro… https://t.co/ZJdT8wpSPC
— Justyna Kowalczyk (@JuiceKowalczyk) ID: 10741618 11. Come forward for pets! ID: 10742238 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Remy Smidt is a reporter with BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Remy Smidt at remy.smidt@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
